tool.name: HMMALIGN
tool.description: - align sequences to an HMM profile using an alignment file, its HMM profile and a metagenome

param.name: alignment
param.label: File that contains the *clean DNA* reference alignment, in Stockholm format

param.name: hmm_file
param.label: Output .hmm file from the hmmbuild step

param.name: metagenome
param.label: The metagenomic sequences to be placed, in FASTA format

tool.help: hmmalign - align sequences to an HMM profile
